hero.title: Morocco's Premier Cinema Equipment House
hero.subtitle: Empowering visionary filmmakers with world-class cameras, lenses, and lighting since 2010.

description_reveal.text: TFS is Morocco's leading cinema equipment rental house, empowering filmmakers since 2010. We continuously support international and local productions with state-of-the-art cameras, precision lenses, and advanced lighting solutions. From the bustling streets of Casablanca to the vast Sahara desert, our dedicated team ensures your vision is captured without compromise.

story.title: From Casablanca to Set
story.p1: TFS - TV Film Solutions was founded in Casablanca with a simple mission: to provide filmmakers in Morocco with access to world-class cinema equipment. What started as a small collection of cameras and lights has grown into one of the region's most trusted equipment rental houses.
story.p2: We understand that great stories deserve great tools. That's why we've invested in premium equipment from RED, ARRI, Sony, and other industry leaders. Our experienced team provides the knowledge and support to help you get the most from every piece of gear.

reliability.title: Quality First
reliability.description: We maintain our equipment to the highest standards because your production depends on it.

speed.title: Client Partnership
speed.description: Your success is our success. We work alongside you from quote to wrap.

innovation.title: Industry Expertise
innovation.description: Our team includes working professionals who understand the demands of film production.

expertise.label: DISCOVER OUR STORY
expertise.title: About Us
expertise.description: We are a passionate team of filmmakers and technicians dedicated to empowering visionaries. With attention to detail and a commitment to excellence, we transform your production needs into reality.

cameras.title: Camera Systems
cameras.description: Latest cinema cameras from ARRI, RED, and Sony.

lenses.title: Premium Optics
lenses.description: Anamorphic and spherical lenses for every look.

lighting.title: Pro Lighting
lighting.description: HMI, LED, and Tungsten tailored for any set.

crew.title: Expert Crew
crew.description: Experienced technicians to support your shoot.

logistics.title: Logistics
logistics.description: Reliable delivery and on-set support across Morocco.

team.label: THE CREW
team.title: Meet the Experts
team.description: Our team consists of industry veterans, certified technicians, and passionate filmmakers who understand exactly what you need on set.

international.label: Global Reach
international.title: Bringing the World to Morocco
international.description: We bridge the gap between international productions and Morocco's stunning landscapes. With a dedicated hub in Casablanca and a network spanning the globe, we provide seamless equipment logistics and support for filmmakers worldwide.

cta.title: Ready to Start?
cta.subtitle: Let's equip your next production with the best gear.
